books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A former member of the Navy SEALs discusses his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war. Kyle was shot to death in Texas in 2013.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995; now a movie.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II; now a movie.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Kim Gordon
books.description: A memoir by a founding member of Sonic Youth.
books.name: GIRL IN A BAND

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the strange death of Gen. George S. Patton in December 1945.
books.name: KILLING PATTON

books.author: by Marc Goodman
books.description: The world of cybercrime and corporate spying, and advice on protecting yourself.
books.name: FUTURE CRIMES

books.author: by Michael Weiss and Hassan Hassan
books.description: An American journalist and a Syrian analyst examine the origins and methods of the terrorist group.
books.name: ISIS

books.author: by Amy Poehler
books.description: A humorous miscellany from the comedian and actress.
books.name: YES PLEASE

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: Intertwined stories of early-20th-century murder and scientific intrigue, by the author of "The Devil in the White City"; first published in 2006.
books.name: THUNDERSTRUCK

books.author: by Stephen Hawking
books.description: The British cosmologist reviews efforts to create a unified theory of the universe; first published in 1988.
books.name: A BRIEF HISTORY OF TIME

books.author: Martin Pistorius with Megan Lloyd Davies
books.description: A South African man learned how to communicate and live a full life despite a mysterious disease that left him mute and in a wheelchair; originally published in 2011.
books.name: GHOST BOY

books.author: by Andrew Hodges
books.description: The life of the British mathematician who broke the Nazis’ wartime codes; the inspiration for the film "The Imitation Game."
books.name: ALAN TURING: THE ENIGMA

books.author: by Bill Gifford
books.description: A review of the science of — and myths about — aging, and advice on how to live longer.
books.name: SPRING CHICKEN
